results.description: Scottish League Two club Queen's Park will decide whether to end their 152-year-old amateur club status on Thursday.
results.shortTitle: Queen's Park to vote on amateur status
results.title: Queen's Park: Scotland's oldest club set to vote on ending 152-year-old amateur status

results.description: Seven goals, two red cards, a penalty and suspicion of an own goal keep the crowd entertained as Annan Athletic hammer bottom side Brechin City in Scottish League Two.
results.title: Annan Athletic 5-2 Brechin City: Seven goals, two red cards, a penalty and maybe an own goal

results.description: Cove Rangers edge past Stirling Albion 1-0 to extend their lead in Scottish League Two to five points as their title rivals faltered.
results.title: Scottish League Two: Cove stretch lead to five points as rivals falter

results.description: Listen to Off The Ball and relive today's Scottish Premiership action
results.title: Listen: Off The Ball

results.description: Cove Rangers maintained their advantage at the top of League Two with a 3-1 win at Cowdenbeath, while second-placed Edinburgh kept within three points of the leaders with a 3-2 victory at bottom side Brechin.
results.shortTitle: Cove maintain lead at the top with win
results.title: League Two: Cove Rangers stay three points clear after 3-1 win over Cowdenbeath

results.description: Follow all the reaction as holders Celtic thrash Hibernian to reach their fourth consecutive Scottish League Cup final.
results.title: 'Some of the football was magnificent' - reaction as Celtic reach League Cup final

results.description: Cove Rangers extend lead at top of League Two to three points after 3-0 win over Albion Rovers
results.shortTitle: League Two: Cove Rangers remain top
results.title: League Two: Cove extend lead at top to three points

results.description: Elgin City are in a Scottish League Two play-off position after beating Queen's Park 3-1 at home.
results.title: Scottish League 2: Elgin City 3-1 Queen's Park

results.description: Albion Rovers manager Kevin Harper shares his story of loss and surviving relegation as part of the #8Proverbs series marking Black History Month.
results.title: #8Proverbs - Kevin Harper on loss and surviving relegation

results.description: Follow all the reaction to a busy day of Scottish football action, with 16 goals in five Premiership games, shocks in the Championship, and the Scottish Cup second round.
results.title: Reaction to Saturday's Scottish football & Off the Ball

results.description: Former Rangers winger Fraser Aird says he can see why people might "raise their eyebrows" about his "stepping stone" move to Cove Rangers.
results.title: 'I will always be remembered playing for Rangers' - Fraser Aird goes from Ibrox to Cove

thumbnail.altText: Fraser Aird in action for Rangers

results.description: Leaders Cove Rangers suffer their first League Two defeat of the season as Stenhousemuir claim a narrow 3-2 win at Ochilview.
results.title: League Two: Cove Rangers suffer first league defeat of the season

results.description: Off the Ball kicks off the day's Scottish football coverage before live text and radio coverage of Saturday's games.
results.title: Listen: Off The Ball & Scottish football reaction

results.description: "Severe" criticism of Scotland's top-flight referees last season was unfair, says former official Hugh Dallas.
results.title: Hugh Dallas: 'Severe' criticism of Scottish referees unfair

results.description: Cove Rangers continue their unbeaten start to the Scottish League Two campaign after their 3-0 win at home against Annan Athletic.
results.shortTitle: Six wins in a row for Cove Rangers
results.title: League Two: Cove Rangers record sixth consecutive win

results.description: Partick Thistle's Kenny Miller and Ayr United's Kris Doolan make the draw for the Scottish Cup second round live on BBC Scotland.
results.shortTitle: Miller and Doolan make Scottish Cup draw
results.title: Scottish Cup: Partick Thistle's Kenny Miller and Ayr United's Kris Doolan make draw

thumbnail.altText: Partick Thistle's Kenny Miller and Ayr United's Kris Doolan

results.description: Cove Rangers continue their unbeaten start to the Scottish League Two campaign with a 2-0 win at Elgin.
results.shortTitle: Fifth win in a row for Cove Rangers
results.title: Scottish League Two: Fifth win in a row for leaders Cove Rangers

thumbnail.altText: Martin Scott in action for Cove Rangers

results.description: Colin McMenamin has been sacked after 10 months in charge of Stenhousemuir.
results.title: Stenhousemuir: Colin McMenamin sacked after 10 months in charge

results.description: Listen to Off the Ball on BBC Radio Scotland and follow live reaction to all of Saturday's SPFL action.
results.title: Reaction to Saturday's Scottish football & Off the Ball

results.description: Unbeaten Cove Rangers ease past Brechin City to remain three points clear at the top as Edinburgh City and Cowdenbeath maintain pressure at the summit.
results.title: Scottish League Two: Unbeaten Cove Rangers beat Brechin to stay top
